Posts.Content: nervouswreckagain wrote: in 2003 I had a mastectomy because of DCIS. SInce then I get very anxious when it's mammogram time. Today I had my 2nd stereotactic biopsy in 2.5 years on my other breast, I'm wondering if the results do not come back benign whether I can just skip the surgical biopsy & go straight to another mastectomy and be done with all this anxiety. I'm probably putting the cart ahead of the horse here but trying to be prepared. Dx 4/2003, DCIS Log in to post a reply
